snippet: North Korea on Friday denied the FBI's accusation that it was behind a devastating hacking attack on Sony but it said the now-shelved film "The Interview" mocked the impoverished but nuclear-armed country....

headline.print_headline: North Korea Denies Connection With Sony Hacking
headline.main: North Korea Denies Connection With Sony Hacking

lead_paragraph: North Korea on Friday denied the FBI's accusation that it was behind a devastating hacking attack on Sony but it said the now-shelved film "The Interview" mocked the impoverished but nuclear-armed country.
